title: Public transport for Spilt Milk: Saturday 2 December 2023
articleContent:
Public transport for Spilt Milk: Saturday 2 December 2023

Events > Music

Get ready for Spilt Milk at Victoria Park in Ballarat!

There will be additional services so you can get to and from the event easily on Saturday 2 December 2023.

Gates open from 11am to 11pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Make your journey hassle-free and remember to top up your myki and have it ready to use before travelling.

Please refer to the Spilt Milk Ballarat website for further event information, set times and accessibility information.

 Regional train

Getting to Ballarat

Passengers can catch regular services arriving at Ballarat Railway Station.

The following additional services will depart Southern Cross Station before the event:

  • 10.50am. Southern Cross to Ballarat. This service will stop at Caroline Springs, Rockbank, Cobblebank, Melton, Bacchus Marsh, Ballan, arriving at Ballarat at 12.16pm.

Leaving Ballarat

Passengers can catch regular services departing Ballarat Railway Station.

The following additional services will depart Wendouree and Ballarat for Southern Cross Station after the event:

  • 11:30pm Wendouree to Southern Cross, arriving at Ballarat 11:34pm, departing Ballarat at 11:39pm and stopping all stations to Ardeer, then running express to Southern Cross arriving at 1:24am.
  • 12:30am Wendouree to Southern Cross, arriving at Ballarat at 12:34am, departing Ballarat at 12:41am and stopping all stations to Ardeer, then running express to Southern Cross arriving at 2:14am.

Plan your journey using Journey planner or download the V/Line timetable for services to and from Ballarat on 2 December 2023 here.

 Metropolitan bus

Getting to Victoria Park, Ballarat

Passengers arriving at Ballarat Station are advised to walk via Coffee Palace Lane to Mair Street and catch a connecting free shuttle bus to Victoria Park, from 9:30am to 6:30pm.

Please refer to the Spilt Milk website for further information on Free Shuttle services from Ballarat Station, including the East City and South City Shuttle Loops here.

Leaving Victoria Park, Ballarat

From 7pm, passengers travelling via the free shuttle bus will be depart Victoria Park from the designated Bus Zone on Gillies Street to Ballarat Station.

Please refer to the Spilt Milk website for further information on Free Shuttle services to Ballarat Station, including the East City and South City Shuttle Loops here.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
